overview: With the start of the war, young people in Tehran were riding motorcycles and having fun. Martyr Chamran asks them to come to the battlefield with their skills in motorcycling and to be present in the headquarters of irregular wars. The director has gone to these young people of yesterday, each of whom is working today. Jalil Naqad, who fought the enemies on the Iranian fronts during the holy defense and was wounded there, today, despite the fact that half of his body was touched and he lost the ability to speak.
title: The Motorcycle Diaries
